PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07772010-06-17,  ,  ,  EC,  F&O,  IA&ND,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
Department of Fisheries and Oceans Act
Northwest Territories Act
SubjectEnvironmental Occurrences Notification Agreement NWT
PrecisOrder approving that the Minister of the Environment, the Minister of Fisheries and Oceans and the Commissioner of the Northwest Territories enter into the ENVIRONMENTAL OCCURRENCES NOTIFICATION AGREEMENT between the Government of Canada and the Government of the Northwest Territories in order to establish a streamlined notification system for persons required to notify proncial/territorial and federal governments of an environmental occurrence.
AttachmentsAttachment
